description.ko: 기하학적 완벽함이 디지털 글리치와 단색 파편으로 부서지는, 질서 속의 혼돈을 표현한 작품.
description.en: A representation of chaos within order, where geometric perfection is shattered by digital glitches and monochrome fragments.

prompt: A recursive, brutalist labyrinth of liquid obsidian #1A1A1A fracturing into a cascade of #FFFFFF white digital noise and vertical #C0C0C0 scanline glitches. The composition is a masterclass in monochrome complexity, featuring sharp geometric abstraction where order dissolves into chaotic fragments. 8k resolution, Octane Render, raytraced reflections on shifting black glass surfaces. High-contrast cinematic lighting creates razor-sharp shadows against a stark white void, emphasizing the perfect balance of a shattering monolith. Detailed textures of digital debris and #808080 grey static.
